NAME: Muath Alsowadi
SUMMARY: Full stack web developer with +7 years of experience. Mainly experienced in: PHP/Laravel, Vue.js/Nuxtjs, SQL, Livewire, Alpine.js, API Development, ChatGPT integration, Gemini integrations, Whatsapp integration, Telegram integration and Server management with Devops automation. Developed variant applications and solutions for a wide range of clients and have the enthusiasm to complete projects with best practices.

RESPONSIBILITIES: The primary duties involve developing the backend and frontend of the company's projects using the PHP/Laravel framework, Livewire and vuejs/nuxt js, participating in business and database design, collaborating with clients and developers Internationally and leveraging the Laravel ecosystems to deliver software solutions.

PROJECTS.NAME: Eazycare
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: A platform that allows users to book laboratory tests and radiology appointments in Saudi Arabia.
DETAILS: The website’s blog gets +100k/month visitors.

The platform shows some Google G4 Analytics on the dashboard.

The platform audits database transactions using custom code and a separate database.

PROJECTS.NAME: Saned Authenticator
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Android application provided by Obeikan Digital in Saudi Arabia.
DETAILS: The API is built using Node Js.

The app generates a unique, 6-digit code TOTP that changes every 30 seconds. This code is used as a second factor of authentication 2FA, in addition to a username and password, to verify the user's identity when logging into an account.
